snippet: West Bromwich Albion's former England goalkeeper Ben Foster has signed a new 2-1/2 year deal through to 2019, the Premier League club announced on Saturday....

headline.main: West Brom Keeper Foster Signs New Deal
headline.print_headline: West Brom Keeper Foster Signs New Deal

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion's former England goalkeeper Ben Foster has signed a new 2-1/2 year deal through to 2019, the Premier League club announced on Saturday.

snippet: After spending last season as one of the key forces behind Leicester's rise to the Premier League title, Jamie Vardy is now the symbol of the team's alarming decline....

headline.main: Jamie Vardy Symbolizing Decline of Champion Leicester
headline.print_headline: Jamie Vardy Symbolizing Decline of Champion Leicester

lead_paragraph: After spending last season as one of the key forces behind Leicester's rise to the Premier League title, Jamie Vardy is now the symbol of the team's alarming decline.

snippet: Chinese Super League club Hebei China Fortune have appointed former Manchester City coach Manuel Pellegrini as their new manager, Chinese and British media reported on Saturday....

headline.main: Hebei China Fortune Name Pellegrini as Manager
headline.print_headline: Hebei China Fortune Name Pellegrini as Manager

lead_paragraph: Chinese Super League club Hebei China Fortune have appointed former Manchester City coach Manuel Pellegrini as their new manager, Chinese and British media reported on Saturday.

snippet: Stoke City's early-season problems were firmly consigned to history as they raced into the top half of the Premier League on Saturday with two cracking goals earning them a 2-0 win over poor travellers Burnley....

headline.main: Stoke Move Into Top Half With Victory Over Burnley
headline.print_headline: Stoke Move Into Top Half With Victory Over Burnley

lead_paragraph: Stoke City's early-season problems were firmly consigned to history as they raced into the top half of the Premier League on Saturday with two cracking goals earning them a 2-0 win over poor travellers Burnley.

snippet: Children as young as 4 years old are potential victims in the sex abuse scandal in British soccer that might be spreading to other sports....

headline.main: 4-Year-Old Kids Possible Victims in Soccer Sex Abuse Scandal
headline.print_headline: 4-Year-Old Kids Possible Victims in Soccer Sex Abuse Scandal

lead_paragraph: Children as young as 4 years old are potential victims in the sex abuse scandal in British soccer that might be spreading to other sports.

snippet: Belgian winger Adnan Januzaj will return to Manchester United for the rest of the season after the Premier League club cut short his loan spell at Bundesliga side Borussia Dortmund....

headline.main: Man United Cut Short Januzaj's Dortmund Loan Spell
headline.print_headline: Man United Cut Short Januzaj's Dortmund Loan Spell

lead_paragraph: Belgian winger Adnan Januzaj will return to Manchester United for the rest of the season after the Premier League club cut short his loan spell at Bundesliga side Borussia Dortmund.

snippet: Jose Mourinho's admiration for Manchester United's summer recruit Zlatan Ibrahimovic soared to new heights on Saturday as he cooed about the Swede's "superman" mentality following his  latest match-winning tour de force at West Bromwich Albion....

headline.main: Mourinho Hails Zlatan the 'Superman' After United Win
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Hails Zlatan the 'Superman' After United Win

lead_paragraph: Jose Mourinho's admiration for Manchester United's summer recruit Zlatan Ibrahimovic soared to new heights on Saturday as he cooed about the Swede's "superman" mentality following his  latest match-winning tour de force at West Bromwich Albion.

snippet: Samir Nasri has left Manchester City for Sevilla on a season-long loan, the Premier League club announced on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Samir Nasri has left Manchester City for Sevilla on a season-long loan, the Premier League club announced on Wednesday.

snippet: Chelsea manager Antonio Conte "doesn't do second" and the club's rise to the top of the Premier League standings under the Italian is hardly surprising, Juventus and Italy goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon has said....

headline.main: Chelsea's Success Under Conte Does Not Surprise Buffon
headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Success Under Conte Does Not Surprise Buffon

lead_paragraph: Chelsea manager Antonio Conte "doesn't do second" and the club's rise to the top of the Premier League standings under the Italian is hardly surprising, Juventus and Italy goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon has said.

snippet: Switzerland central defender Philippe Senderos has left Aston Villa by mutual consent, the Premier League club said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Swiss Defender Senderos Leaves Aston Villa
headline.print_headline: Swiss Defender Senderos Leaves Aston Villa

lead_paragraph: Switzerland central defender Philippe Senderos has left Aston Villa by mutual consent, the Premier League club said on Wednesday.
